code: import{createAsyncThunk,createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';var initialState={stations:[],loading:false,error:''};export var fetchStations=createAsyncThunk('stations/fetchStations',function(){return axios.get('https://api.tidesandcurrents.noaa.gov/mdapi/prod/webapi/stations.json?type=harcon').then(function(response){return response.data;});});export var stationsSlice=createSlice({name:'stations',initialState:initialState,reducers:{},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){builder.addCase(fetchStations.pending,function(state){state.loading=true;});builder.addCase(fetchStations.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.stations=action.payload.stations;state.error='';});builder.addCase(fetchStations.rejected,function(state,action){state.loading=false;state.stations=[];state.error=action.error.message;});}});export default stationsSlice.reducer;
